channel.title: Error in opening zip file please help
channel.description: java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:214) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:144) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:115) at client.unZipFile(client.java:3365) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3338) at client.method67(client.java:3410) at client.method6(client.java:6853) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4493) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

item.title: Error in opening zip file please help
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

smdson:

download winrar bro

my problem was winrar i deleted it it works fine now lol plus it downloads my cache on everyone computer now unzips fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Error in opening zip file please help

item.title: Error in opening zip file please help
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

[quote=“thomashawkins4866, post:1, topic:481549”]kind of got idea why just need some info if im on the right path here…
my idea when you download the cache its zip right will u unzip the cache java does and it pop up main_cache_file right will there it unpacks all the other files into another folder called cache i think thats messing it up would it be? and if so how do i stop it from doing this? i dont have them in any folders in the zip…
when i made path on signlink like C:.cache.zip_file_store_32\cache it gave me loaderror #20 <<

ok before i post whats going on where is says yourname i typed everything i could everyfile damn near n i get the samething! over and over finly got my cache download all the way. just im getting this now i know its a !!!pathway error!!! but idk why im getting this error

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:.yourname_file_store_32\client.zip (The system
cannot find the file specified)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:214)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:144)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:115)
at client.unZipFile(client.java:3382)
at client.downloadcache(client.java:3355)
at client.method67(client.java:3428)
at client.method6(client.java:6872)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47)
at client.run(client.java:4512)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)[/quote]

Is that not you?

If so go and find wherever it says C:.yourname_file_store_32\client.zip and change it to the correct directory which for thomashawkins4866’s (chough chough) would be C:.cache.zip_file_store_32\cache

However it also looks like it is trying to unzip a zip folder where as you simply have a directory with the cache unzipped. I think you need to read up on some tutorials…

Read full topic
